patient_info: Elevated circulating growth hormone concentration,Increased circulating prolactin concentration,Cafe-au-lait spot,Acne,Abnormal calvaria morphology,Elevated circulating alkaline phosphatase concentration,Accelerated skeletal maturation,Fibrous dysplasia of the bones,Premature pubarche,Increased serum testosterone level,Abnormality of the testis size,Thickened cortex of bones
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. Growth hormone excess (GHE) due to a growth hormone insensitivity syndrome or a functional pituitary tumor
2. Prolactin excess (PEx) caused by a pituitary tumor or a functional hyperprolactinemia
3. Cafe-au-lait spot (CAL) caused by a congenital adrenocarcinoma or a hyperplasia
4. Acne caused by an androgen excess or an imbalance of skin油脂分泌
5. Abnormal calvaria morphology (ACM) caused by a rare genetic disorder or a congenital abnormality
6. Elevated alkaline phosphatase (ALP) concentration caused by a bone disease or a chronic kidney disease
7. Accelerated skeletal maturation (ASM) caused by a rare genetic disorder or a chronic disease
8. Fibrous dysplasia of the bones (FDOB) caused by a rare genetic disorder or a bone disease
9. Premature pubarche (PP) caused by a hormonal imbalance or a genetic disorder
10. Increased testosterone level (IT) caused by a hormonal imbalance or a tumor.
